songs.title: Under the Radar
songs.firstLine: Nobody saw our sails on the horizon
songs.lastLine: Here we come, fife and drum, under the radar we crept on!

songs.title: Until The Day You Die
songs.firstLine: I've chased this dream since I was five

songs.title: Too Far To Turn Back
songs.firstLine: We've come too far to turn back
songs.lastLine: Turn back turn back turn back turn back...

songs.title: Fu Inle
songs.lastLine: ring the change of days now done.
